survey_comments: Agent was helpful and applied credit. Waiting for tower fix.
Agent was dismissive and unhelpful. Very frustrated!
Terrible service! No resolution and agent refused to help.
Raj was excellent! Fixed my problem in minutes.
Agent tried to help but no real solution. Still have slow speeds.
Worst experience ever! Previous issue not resolved and no record found.
Quick and easy! Ahmad was great.
Finally got WiFi calling enabled but took 3 calls to resolve.
Melissa fixed billing error immediately. Excellent!
Issue acknowledged but no immediate solution. Disappointed.
Simple WiFi calling setup. Worked perfectly!
Tower upgrade next month. No help for current problem.
Agent refused to help with roaming charges. Very upset!
Smooth upgrade to 5G! Great experience!
Agent fixed signal issue with tower adjustment. Good!
APN setup worked first try. Quick support!
Called to compliment agent Siti. Excellent service!
Third call about same issue! No fix! Switching to Maxis!
Double billing error again. System problems not fixed.
Business account setup was professional and easy.
Network issues for weeks with no real action. Very poor!
Address update was quick and simple.
Payment extension without fees. Very understanding!
5G speeds below advertised. No clear timeline for fix.
VoLTE activation simple and quick. Works great!
